Subject: DrillBit's Secret Weopon
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

DrillBit walked back to his room, to test his new weopon.
He has soundproofed his room, and set up a wall as a target.
The wall was made of a metal, that a nuclear blast only causes micro
fractures too. He put the weopon on his right arm. It was a perfect
replica of the original Megatrons arm cannon. He fired, and the metal
was blown to micro fragments. His Super Fusion Cannon was the perfect
weopon.
"YES!" He yelled to himself.
